settings.option.audio.enableAdvancedFunc: Enabling AudioContext functionality will allow for extended audio features like Audio Normalisation, Equalisers and Visualisers - however on some systems this may cause stuttering in audio tracks.
Normalises peak volume for individual tracks to create a more uniform listening experience.
Spatialise audio and make audio more 3-dimensional (note: This is not Dolby Atmos)
spatial.notTurnedOn: Audio Spatialisation is disabled. To use, please enable it first.
